column5: Text
For God so loved the world
column6: that he gave his only Son
column7: that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.

column5: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good
column6: for those who are called according to his purpose.

column5: Go therefore and make disciples of all nations
column6: baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit
column7: teaching them to observe all that I have commanded you. And behold
column9: to the end of the age.

column5: Trust in the Lord with all your heart
column6: and do not lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him
column7: and he will make straight your paths.

column5: Yea
column6: I did remember all my sins and iniquities
column7: for which I was tormented with the pains of hell; yea
column8: I saw that I had rebelled against my God and that I had not kept his holy commandments.

column5: Adam fell that men might be
column6: and men are that they might have joy.

column5: And behold
column6: I am the light and the life of the world; and I have drunk out of that bitter cup which the Father hath given me
column7: and have glorified the Father in taking upon me the sins of the world
column8: in the which I have suffered the will of the Father in all things from the beginning.

column5: In the beginning
column6: God created the heavens and the earth.

column5: Jesus said to him
column6: "I am the way
column7: and the truth
column8: and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me."

column5: Be still
column6: and know that I am God. I will be exalted among the nations
column7: I will be exalted in the earth!

column5: But they who wait for the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings like eagles; they shall run and not be weary; they shall walk and not faint.
And behold
column6: I tell you these things that ye may learn wisdom; that ye may learn that when ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God.

column5: Come to me
column6: all who labor and are heavy laden
column7: and I will give you rest.

column5: Do not be conformed to this world
column6: but be transformed by the renewal of your mind
column7: that by testing you may discern what is the will of God
column8: what is good and acceptable and perfect.

column5: Do not be anxious about anything
column6: but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God. And the peace of God
column7: which surpasses all understanding
column8: will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

column5: Let all that you do be done in love.
And now
column6: my sons
column7: remember
column8: remember that it is upon the rock of our Redeemer
column11: that ye must build your foundation; that when the devil shall send forth his mighty winds
column15: when all his hail and his mighty storm shall beat upon you
column16: it shall have no power over you to drag you down to the gulf of misery and endless wo
column17: because of the rock upon which ye are built
column19: a foundation whereon if men build they cannot fall.

column5: A new commandment I give to you
column6: that you love one another: just as I have loved you
column7: you also are to love one another.

column5: For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God
column6: not a result of works
column7: so that no one may boast.

column5: Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.
And when ye shall receive these things
column6: I would exhort you that ye would ask God
column7: the Eternal Father
column9: if these things are not true; and if ye shall ask with a sincere heart
column12: he will manifest the truth of it unto you
column13: by the power of the Holy Ghost. And by the power of the Holy Ghost ye may know the truth of all things.

column5: In the same way
column6: let your light shine before others
column7: so that they may see your good works and give glory to your Father who is in heaven.

column5: This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.
Casting all your anxieties on him
column6: because he cares for you.

column5: And now as I said concerning faith—faith is not to have a perfect knowledge of things; therefore if ye have faith ye hope for things which are not seen
column6: which are true.

column5: The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy. I came that they may have life and have it abundantly.
Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be frightened
column6: and do not be dismayed
column7: for the Lord your God is with you wherever you go.

column5: Make a joyful noise to the Lord
column6: all the earth! Serve the Lord with gladness! Come into his presence with singing!

column5: For God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power and love and self-control.
But seek first the kingdom of God and his righteousness
column6: and all these things will be added to you.

column5: God is our refuge and strength
column6: a very present help in trouble.

column5: For behold
column6: this life is the time for men to prepare to meet God; yea
column7: behold the day of this life is the day for men to perform their labors.

column5: Therefore
column6: my beloved brothers
column7: be steadfast
column9: always abounding in the work of the Lord
column10: knowing that in the Lord your labor is not in vain.

column5: Delight yourself in the Lord
column6: and he will give you the desires of your heart.

column5: I praise you
column6: for I am fearfully and wonderfully made. Wonderful are your works; my soul knows it very well.

column5: Fear not
column6: for I am with you; be not dismayed
column7: for I am your God; I will strengthen you
column9: I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

column5: Now faith is the assurance of things hoped for
column6: the conviction of things not seen.

column5: And we talk of Christ
column6: we rejoice in Christ
column7: we preach of Christ
column9: and we write according to our prophecies
column10: that our children may know to what source they may look for a remission of their sins.

column5: Oh
column6: taste and see that the Lord is good! Blessed is the man who takes refuge in him!

column5: But he was pierced for our transgressions; he was crushed for our iniquities; upon him was the chastisement that brought us peace
column6: and with his wounds we are healed.
